trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKME120_04438_SEQ_00<tab>Venat is watching you in quiet contemplation.
TEXT_AKTKME120_04438_TODO_02<tab>Report to Krile in the main hall of the Baldesion Annex.

TEXT_AKTKME120_04438_VENAS_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, listen to me. Our duty now is not to denounce Hermes for his misguided determination, or to convince Emet-Selch and Hythlodaeus that they have been deceived.
TEXT_AKTKME120_04438_VENAS_000_001<tab>No, we must instead ensure that the experiences Hermes sought to expunge are preserved.
TEXT_AKTKME120_04438_VENAS_000_002<tab>What remains in our memories alone will be our weapon against the Final Days.
TEXT_AKTKME120_04438_VENAS_000_003<tab>You must fight this battle in your age, and I in mine...
TEXT_AKTKME120_04438_VENAS_000_004<tab>Come, let us walk together once more. I will see you to the doors of Propylaion.
TEXT_AKTKME120_04438_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>Your time in this age is drawing to an end.
TEXT_AKTKME120_04438_SYSTEM_000_006<tab>Upon speaking to Venat, several cutscenes will play in sequence.
TEXT_AKTKME120_04438_SYSTEM_000_007<tab>It is recommended that you set aside sufficient time to view these scenes in their entirety.
TEXT_AKTKME120_04438_TATARU_000_020<tab>You've a knack for turning up <var 1A 02 /var>exactly<var 1A 01 /var> when needed, and this is no exception!
TEXT_AKTKME120_04438_KRILE_000_031<tab>I'd heard you were off in the First as part of our efforts to investigate the Final Days.
TEXT_AKTKME120_04438_KRILE_000_032<tab>Well, as so often seems to be the case, while you were away, we've had some few developments...
TEXT_AKTKME120_04438_KRILE_000_033<tab>...Which we can discuss in just a moment. For now, however, I cannot tell you how wonderful it is to have you back!
